rdfs:label: Potion
ns:common.topic.description: potion is a tiny, fast dynamic, stack-oriented computer programming language with a JIT compiler, closures, continuations and exceptions, a Lua-based VM and an Io-based object model built around message passing, a MOP and mixins. It is technically a lexical-only Lisp-1 with two languages: one for code, one for data and it is written in under 10K lines of C.
ns:type.object.name: Potion
